Stellar reimagines lighting control by automatically managing complex DMX settings and by featuring control interfaces with stunning graphic design. Programmed intelligence and advanced communication make connecting ARRI LED fixtures and third party fixtures to the app simple and straightforward.\r\n \r\nFeatures:\r\n- Create projects and scenes to organize your lighting setups \r\n- Automatic discovery of ARRI fixtures using RDM\r\n- Auto Layout (automatically manages DMX modes and addresses)\r\n- Unique and beautiful user interfaces for all color modes\r\n- Control CCT, HSI, RGBW, x,y Coordinates, Gel Selection, Source Matching and Lighting Effects\r\n- Select gel and source matching colors for the L-Series\r\n- Import a light plot diagram to visually layout fixtures\r\n- Advanced color gamut selection in x,y Coordinates\r\n- Group fixtures to control them at the same time\r\n- Favorites to store a custom color or lighting effect\r\n- Look creation to store scene color settings\r\n- Live Sync\r\n- Export/Import projects, scenes, & favorites\r\n- iCloud backup\r\n- Change settings of fixtures\r\n- Control the master intensity of all fixtures\r\n- Multi-Select fixtures \r\n- Advanced search and sort functions\r\n- Quickly identify fixtures via RDM\r\n- Handles Art-Net compliant nodes and complex DMX networks\r\n- Assign names to fixture for easy referencing\r\n- Works on iPhones and iPads\r\n \r\nStellar is the perfect app to quickly and easily control ARRI and third party lights while on set. Whether a large film with many scenes and setups or a small project with just a few fixtures, Stellar is built to work in all scenarios. With a long list of feature additions already implemented and planned, Stellar is growing into a fully featured lighting control platform. We believe that you have the skills that can save us all!\r\n\r\n\r\nStarting out as an ensign, there will be a lot of action as you are immersed into a do-or-die situation.  Galactic space is divided into many sectors.  Within each sector is a quadrant.   In each quadrant there might be enemies, planets, stars and a star base or two.  Shields up, torpedoes armed,  Fly your starship and take the war to the enemy and help build the new Federation.\r\n\r\n\r\nScouting the Sector - Scroll on the map and touch to use your impulse engines to move short distances.   To travel to farther sectors, bring up your Star Chart to see local space.  Select a Quadrant and Engage Warp and start your trek!  The Star Chart will display the location of your starbase.  They will show red if they are under attack, green if all is clear.\r\n\r\n\r\nWhen your energy runs low, your shields stop working or you have damage to repair, take your starship and head to your local starbase.  There you can enjoy some R&R while your starship gets repaired.\r\n\r\n\r\nAs you drive your enemy back, they will become relentless at trying to stop your progress.  You will be rewarded with dilithium crystals for your victories.   Mine crystals from local planets.   Use these crystals to upgrade your starship.  You can also purchase crystals to speed up your ship upgrades.\r\n\r\n\r\nWeapon of Last Resort - the Death Ray!  When it's time to take out a bunch of the enemy, and things aren't looking too good, its time for the death ray.  Roll the dice as you either destroy everything within the quadrant or perform a gallant act of self immolation!\r\n\r\n\r\nWhen all else fails ... Call for Help!  Your starship is floating scrap, your crew is mostly dead... It's time... to ... Call for Help!   Why fly solo when you have a friend at your back?  It's time to hand some back...\r\n\r\n\r\nGood Hunting out there!  It's a cold and hard universe, space is full of enemies.  Balance your attacks with recovery at a nearby starbase and you will progress.   Don't forget the enemy has a few tricks up their sleeves that they won't hesitate to use. Oh, and watch out for black holes and supernovas!\r\n\r\n* To win at Stellar Trek, make sure you watch your energy and shields, and head to a starbase often to recharge and repair.  Mine planets for the crystals to make upgrades happen faster, return to a starbase to sell your cargo.\r\n\r\n*Unique Features* - space combat / space battle / space fighter sim\r\n\r\n‚Ä¢ Become the hero of the galaxy starting from your home star\r\n‚Ä¢ cross a vast galaxy with 60 star systems as well as hundreds of planets and bases.\r\n‚Ä¢ Achievements and leaderboards to track your progress\r\n‚Ä¢ Upgrade your spaceships and weapons systems, power-ups\r\n‚Ä¢ Take part in epic battles\r\n‚Ä¢ Mine planets for their dilithium crystals\r\n‚Ä¢ Hours and hours of gameplay\r\n‚Ä¢ High-quality visuals including models,  textures and effects\r\n\r\n All for free ! \r\n\r\n*and don't forget our sister space sim Stellar Patrol","descriptionHTML":"* Take command of your starship and save the galaxy in this classic retro space combat sim *<br><br>Stellar Trek - The Federation has been destroyed. Take control of your elite squad and defeat your opponents in one of over 90 different missions.  Join games that are waiting for an opponent or start your own, then equip your units and away you go.  All your units are under your control and they can move, shoot and use equipment, whether its an barren planet, space station or alien-infested moonbase.  No two games are ever the same, and you can play as many as you want.  This game has NO in-app purchases or adverts.\r\n\r\nWIDE VARIETY OF MISSIONS\r\nThere are over 90 different kinds of mission.  These start with basic assasination where you must kill an important VIP that is being protected, and sabotage where you must destroy installations.  Once you become advanced, you can take on the more advanced missions such as egg collector, where you must collect more alien eggs than your opponents, but watch out for the aliens that are protecting them.  There are missions for 2, 3 or 4 players.  Some missions involve Escorting a VIP across a sniper infested town, or being the first to collect the flag which in some missions may be located in the centre of an alien prison.  Or maybe you want to control a gang of criminals intent on making an escape from the maximum security prison?\r\n\r\nSee all the mission here: http://www.stellarforces.com/dsr/missiondescriptions.cls\r\n\r\n\r\nDIFFERENT KINDS OF UNITS\r\nNot only can you play a squad of humans, there are also mission where you can play vicious aliens that can tear a human apart and explode with acid blood, or blobs which can split into smaller blobs or join together to make a giant super-blob.  There are also missions with zombies, which don't stay dead for long, or clones, which just keep on coming.  Can you survive to the end?\r\n\r\n\r\nWIDE VARIETY OF EQUIPMENT\r\nAs well as the guns, there is also a wide variety of other equipment that you can equip your units with.  These include grenades from small to big, smoke grenades to prevent you being seen, nerve gas to smoke out the enemy, medi-kits and close-combat weapons, and also protective armour.\r\n\r\nSee all the weapons and equipment here: http://www.stellarforces.com/dsr/equipmentdetails.cls\r\n\r\n\r\nADVANCED FEATURES\r\nThis game has lots of advanced features for the experienced player to make the game even more exciting.  Units can give away their locations if they make a noise.  Smoke or nerve gas can spread and effect a unit's line-of-sight.  Fully destructive scenery and walls.  If the enemy is expecting you to go through the main entrance, why not blow a hole in the wall?\r\n\r\n\r\nLEAGUE TABLE & TROPHIES\r\nStellar Forces has a league table showing the best players.  Can you get to the top?  After a game has finished, you can watch a complete playback to see exactly how close you were to winning or losing. Test it before using it with real money.\r\n\r\n\r\nCurrent functions:\r\n - Generate wallets.\r\n - Import/Export wallets.\r\n - Send/Receive transactions, using QR codes or contacts. Any asset you already have.\r\n - Set inflation address.\r\n - Fund other wallets.\r\n - Check founds and account info.\r\n - Create a contact list.\r\n - Implements federation address resolution.\r\n - Sign transactions offline.\r\n - Set a password to save and use each wallet. \r\n \r\nHow to sign transactions offline:\r\n\r\nTo sign transactions offline download the application to two devices and one of them you let without network; no sim, no wifi, no nfc.\r\nOn the offline device create or import the wallet you want to administrate.\r\nOn the online device import the public address of that wallet.\r\n\r\nNow you can prepare the transaction on the online device using the public address. On the signing screen you will get a QR code with the unsigned transaction. As you only have the public address, you can't sign it from there.\r\n\r\nOn the offline device use the operation \"sign transaction\" and scan the prepared transaction. Then on the signing screen you can sign it using the offline secret key. \r\n\r\nAfter signing the transaction a new QR code will be displayed with the signed one, scan it back with the online device and publish it to the network. The secret key will never leave your offline device.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\nNOTICE: Use at own Risk.","descriptionHTML":"It will use test network and any wallet you create or import can be funded with test founds from the wallet info screen. Mwangi songs offline","description":"Stella Nyambura Mwangi (born 1 September 1986), also known by the stage name STL, is a Kenyan-Norwegian singer, songwriter and rapper. Mwangi writes a lot of her music about the situation in her home country Kenya, and about discrimination both Stella and her family had to go through after moving to Norway in 1991. Her work has been used in films such as American Pie Presents: The Naked Mile and Save the Last Dance 2, and also in TV-series such as CSI: NY and Scrubs. She has won several awards including; the Kisima Awards, Clops Awards and Jeermaan Awards, she is one of the most popular singers in Norway after winning the Melodi Grand Prix 2011.\r\n\r\nMwangi represented Norway at The Eurovision Song Contest 2011 in D√ºsseldorf, Germany, one year after her country hosted the event, and was eliminated in the first semi-final.\r\n\r\nMwangi has had hit songs in Kenya, Senegal, and Gambia. Mwangi's 2018 single \"No Games\" featured on a TV advertisement by Samsung for their Galaxy S9 smartphone.\r\n\r\nEarly and personal life\r\nStella was born in Murang'a in Central Province of Kenya in 1986 and spent her first 5 years there before her family moved to Eidsvoll in Norway in 1991. She started to practice playing music when she was eight years old. She also plays the piano. Her father made sure she and her siblings learned Gikuyu language and Swahili even far away from home. He used cultural music and poetry to teach them the languages and this inspired Stella's music and her connection to the Kenyan culture.\r\n\r\nMwangi's father was killed in a hit-and-run accident in February 2012\r\n\r\nEurovision Song Contest 2011\r\nIn 2011, Mwangi participated in the Norwegian national selection Melodi Grand Prix 2011 to represent Norway in the Eurovision Song Contest 2011, which was held in D√ºsseldorf, Germany. On 12 February 2011, Mwangi emerged as the winner.\r\n\r\nOn 10 May, she represented Norway at the Eurovision Song Contest with the song \"Haba Haba\" but failed to qualify for the Eurovision final, despite being one of the big favourites of the contest.\r\n\r\nMwangi first topped the official singles chart in Norway in week 6, 2011 with her winning song \"Haba Haba\".","descriptionHTML":"Stella Nyambura Mwangi (born 1 September 1986), also known by the stage name STL, is a Kenyan-Norwegian singer, songwriter and rapper. Mwangi writes a lot of her music about the situation in her home country Kenya, and about discrimination both Stella and her family had to go through after moving to Norway in 1991. Her work has been used in films such as American Pie Presents: The Naked Mile and Save the Last Dance 2, and also in TV-series such as CSI: NY and Scrubs. She has won several awards including; the Kisima Awards, Clops Awards and Jeermaan Awards, she is one of the most popular singers in Norway after winning the Melodi Grand Prix 2011.<br><br>Mwangi represented Norway at The Eurovision Song Contest 2011 in D√ºsseldorf, Germany, one year after her country hosted the event, and was eliminated in the first semi-final.<br><br>Mwangi has had hit songs in Kenya, Senegal, and Gambia. Players take the role of spaceship pilots in a vast, persistent online galaxy. Trade between stations and build an empire, or pirate traders who dare to pursue routes through areas of lawless space. Fight other players, or cooperate with friends to push back the mysterious Hive. Mine ores and minerals, gather resources, and craft unusual items. Join the military of your nation, and participate in massive online battles (see the trailer). A wide variety of gameplay styles are available, from the the intensity of huge battles and realtime PvP, to the low-key enjoyment of quiet trading and mining in less dangerous areas of the galaxy. Play the style of game that suits you, or that suits your current mood. The availability of relatively casual and short-term goals allows for fun when only a little time is available to play.\r\n\r\nVendetta Online is free-to-play on Android, with no level caps. An optional low subscription cost of only $1 per month allows access to large Capital Ship construction. The Android version includes several helpful features:\r\n\r\n- Single-Player mode: after completing the tutorial, a single-player sandbox sector becomes available, letting you perfect your flying technique and enjoy minigames while offline.\r\n- Game controllers, TV Mode: use your favorite gamepad to play, Moga, Nyko, PS3, Xbox, Logitech and others. Gamepad-oriented \"TV Mode\" is enabled on micro-console and set-top box devices like AndroidTV.\r\n- Keyboard and Mouse support (with FPS-style mouse capture on Android).\r\n\r\nAdditionally, be aware of the following:\r\n\r\n- Free download, no strings attached.. find out if the game is for you.\r\n- Seamlessly switch between mobile and PC! Play the game on your Mac, Windows, or Linux machine when at home. Single universe for all platforms.\r\n\r\nSystem Requirements:\r\n\r\n- Dual-core 1Ghz+ ARMv7 device, running Android 5 or better, with an ES 2.x compliant GPU (a modern multi-core device with an ES 3.x GPU is recommended).\r\n- 600MB of free SD space recommended. The game may use about 500MB, but patches itself, so additional free space is advised.\r\n- 1GB of device RAM memory. This is a graphically intensive game! Anything less may experience force-closes, and is at your own risk.\r\n- We suggest installing over Wifi (for the large download), but playing the game should use relatively little bandwidth, and works well over most 3G networks. You are responsible for monitoring your own bandwidth usage.\r\n- If you experience a problem, please post to our forums so we can get more information from you. We fix issues as soon as possible, but we simply do not have *every* phone.\r\n\r\nCaveats and Additional Information:\r\n\r\n- The hardware intensity of this game often exposes device driver issues that remain hidden with other apps. If your device itself crashes and reboots, it is a driver bug! Not the game!\r\n- This is a large and complex game, a true PC-style MMO. Do not expect a \"mobile\" game experience. If you take a little time to read the tutorials, you will succeed at the game much more quickly.\r\n- The tablet and handset flight interfaces may take a little time to learn, although they are effective with some experience. The flight UI will be continually improved as we receive user feedback. Keyboard play can also be very effective.\r\n- We are a continually evolving game, often with patches released weekly. Our users are encouraged to help the game development process by posting to the Suggestions and Android forums of our website.","descriptionHTML":"(ENGLISH ONLY)<br><br>Vendetta Online is a free, graphically intensive and cross-platform MMORPG set in space. Device is mounted with a smart card that has obtained the security level required by the financial sector, and Secure OS is built into the microprocessor to provide a secure execution environment to isolate/process private keys and data.\r\nThe fingerprint is enrolled through the fingerprint scanner and it is used to verify the owner at the signing stage of trading cryptocurrency. In addition to fingerprint, the device supports password (PIN) function.\r\nThrough the BLE(Low Power Bluetooth) interface, you can easily transfer cryptocurrency wirelessly in a mobile environment. The cryptocurrency address in QR code shown on the OLED display can be presented to receive money directly to your account.\r\nDownload the latest firmware through the USB cable included in the product package to keep your D‚ÄôCENT Biometric Hardware Wallet up to date. \r\n\r\n[Main Features]\r\n1.\tEmbedded with Secure OS developed by TEE(Trusted Execution Environment) technology experts.\r\n2.\tUse in a mobile environment through BLE(Low Power Bluetooth).\r\n3.\tDisplay the cryptocurrency address as a QR code on the OLED screen.\r\n4.\tWith battery capacity of 585mA, it lasts for one month on a single full charge.\r\n5.\tUse the USB cable included in the product package to download the latest firmware and keep the device up to date.\r\n\r\n‚ñ† D‚ÄôCENT Card-type Hardware Wallet\r\nD‚ÄôCENT Card-type Hardware Wallet allows you to manage cryptocurrency assets with a simple touch. It is a cold wallet in the form of a credit card that uses a secure chip used in the financial sector to exchange and manage NFTs such as game items. Galaxy Map PRO","description":"Take a thrilling ride through space and visit strange new alien star systems such as multiple star systems (from binary to septenary), multiple planetary systems, circumbinary planets and disks, black holes, pulsars and magnetars.\r\nEver wondered how far from Earth are the stars you see in the night sky? Or how far or close they are to each other? Now you can visualize those distances in 3D with a star map divided into 10 parsec sectors (cubes) or 32.62 light years, for an easier observation. Sector (0,0,0) is our home sector and Sol is the Solar System.\r\n\r\nFrom the outskirts of the galaxy, in the Norma-Outer spiral arm to the galactic center's supermassive black hole Sagittarius A*, discover a galaxy full of amazing facts. Notable structures included: the Pillars of Creation, Helix Nebula, the Engraved Hourglass Nebula, the Pleiades, the Orion Arm (where the solar system and the Earth are located) with its Orion belt. Check out neighboring dwarf galaxies such as Sagittarius and the Canis Major Overdensity, stellar streams as well as internal galactic components such as a variety of nebulae, star clusters or supernovae.\r\nPhotos are taken by NASA spacecraft and ground based telescopes like Hubble Space Telescope, Chandra X-Ray, Herschel Space Observatory and the Spitzer Space Telescope.\r\n\r\nFeatures\r\n‚òÖ Almost 4.5 milion stars, over 4000 exoplanets, 200 circumstellar disks, 38 black holes, 11 magnetars and around 2500 pulsars in the database\r\n‚òÖ Planets are updated daily from multiple sources, without needing to update the app\t\r\n‚òÖ Stars extracted from SIMBAD from multiple catalogs like the European Space Agency's Hipparcos mission, the Gliese catalogue and parts of the ASCC - All Sky Compiled Catalogue and the most recent GAIA catalogue\r\n‚òÖ 3D representations of all star systems and their orbits (green stars = unknown spectrum)\r\n‚òÖ black holes in binary systems, including the famous Cygnus X-1 and the Great Annihilator (the only binary system with a black hole and a pulsar)\r\n‚òÖ pulsars and pulsar planets - the first type of planet ever discovered beyond our solar system, orbiting the extremely dense core of a massive star that exploded as a supernova. Fewer than 1% of pulsars have been found to host planets.\r\n‚òÖ magnetars, a special and rare type of neutron star\r\n‚òÖ Search for stars, planets, disks, black holes, neutron stars and magnetars by a wide range of parameters: name, type, system type, constellation, catalog, star type (color)\r\n‚òÖ Detailed information for every stellar object\r\n\r\nExplore space and get a little closer to our wonderful universe with this awesome astronomy app! \r\nThis interactive 3D map is excellent for teachers to use for instruction, and it is a great resource for students to explore the Milky Way galaxy and space as they learn more about the universe we live in. \r\n\r\nAn internet connection is necessary to access the online stellar database as well as the wiki information. A subset of the database between sectors (-10,-10,-10) and (10,10,10) can be queried offline including planetary and orbit data.","descriptionHTML":"Take a thrilling ride through space and visit strange new alien star systems such as multiple star systems (from binary to septenary), multiple planetary systems, circumbinary planets and disks, black holes, pulsars and magnetars.<br>Ever wondered how far from Earth are the stars you see in the night sky? You can't really pick it up for an hour and get much out of it. It's intended to be a digital universe in your pocket with its own virtual economy and a community of people that will probably be around for awhile.\r\n\r\nTo be clear though, it's not an idle clicker game, it does take thought and strategy to succeed.\r\n\r\nIt is heavily economy oriented, with an emphasis on colonizing entire solar systems full of planets and building structures on them to generate resources over time, making it a bit of a mix of a 4X space game (Explore, Expand, Exploit, Exterminate), Universe Simulator, and a Tycoon game.\r\n\r\nFleet battles are 1v1, so while you can't be in the same fight with a friend, you can help defend your friend's territory from attacks by leaving your fleet in orbit over their planet.\r\n\r\nThe universe is persistent, so anything gained is kept, allowing you to build up a large interstellar empire over time.\r\n\r\nGameplay -\r\n\r\n* Play as an interstellar Corporation that warps to the safety of the Andromeda Galaxy to escape an alien invasion of Earth and The Milky Way.\r\n\r\n* Build up an economy by constructing and upgrading habitats for workers, solar arrays for power, resorts for tourists, mines and refineries for metals, and much more.\r\n\r\n* Hire a Stellar Representative that levels up and gains perk points that can be used to boost the efficiency all the planets in a solar system.\r\n\r\n* Use the resources you've harvested from your planets to build ships and outfit them with weapons and support modules.\r\n\r\n* Create colony ships to expand your Corporation to even more planets and moons.\r\n\r\n* Terraform your planets to make them more habitable for your Workers and Tourists by altering the planet's Temperature, Water Level and Pollution.\r\n\r\n* Form fleets of up to 12 ships and retake Earth, Mars and the rest of Sol from the aliens known as \"Strith\", or fight against other players and take their planets.\r\n\r\n* Not into PvP? The game is fully playable without going into the open PvP areas, although you'd run out of content much faster.\r\n\r\n* Trade with other players for credits, resources, ships, weapons and support modules, or use the Bazaar to leave orders to buy or sell resources while your offline.\r\n\r\n* Form alliances with other players and work together.\r\n\r\nFleet Battles -\r\n\r\nLeave a fleet in orbit over a planet to protect it from other players while you're away.\r\nShips automatically fire at targets with basic weapons like gattling guns and lasers.\r\nPlayers have control over unique abilities such as Nuke, EMP, Prism Gel, Draw Fire, Focus Fire, Repair Beam and Shield Beam making fleet composition and strategy important.\r\nHire a Fleet Commander that levels up from fleet battles and gains points that can unlock perks that boost all the ships in their fleet.\r\n\r\nLand Battles -\r\nBuild defenses on the surface of your planets as a second layer of defense against other players that takes a lot longer to destroy than a fleet.\r\nFill up troop transport ships and enter orbit of another player's planet to land your troops and invade it.\r\n\r\nPrice, Ads and Micro-transactions -\r\n\r\n* Only cosmetic or convenience perks for Micro-Transactions.\r\n* Optional ads only.\r\n* Uses the least invasive micro transaction system I can think of.\r\nMicro-transactions can buy one thing: Time Crystals.\r\nTime Crystals can be used to skip building and repair timers, painting ships, buying cosmetic holograms, or re-rolling resources on a planet slot.\r\nTime crystals can also be occasionally obtained as in-game loot, or from a rewarded video ad.\r\nBuild Timers aren't crazy long forcing you to buy time crystals either.\r\n\r\nNow also available on Steam.\r\n\r\nA video summary can be found here:\r\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1mm4g0G3PW0","descriptionHTML":"(Available in English Only!)<br>Andromeda isn&#39;t like most other games, it has been slowly developed by one person for years now, and the direction it has taken has been constantly shaped by feedback and ideas from users to make it what it is today.<br>It is a constant work in progress.<br><br>It&#39;s not super fast paced. You can&#39;t really pick it up for an hour and get much out of it. It&#39;s intended to be a digital universe in your pocket with its own virtual economy and a community of people that will probably be around for awhile.<br><br>To be clear though, it&#39;s not an idle clicker game, it does take thought and strategy to succeed.<br><br>It is heavily economy oriented, with an emphasis on colonizing entire solar systems full of planets and building structures on them to generate resources over time, making it a bit of a mix of a 4X space game (Explore, Expand, Exploit, Exterminate), Universe Simulator, and a Tycoon game.<br><br>Fleet battles are 1v1, so while you can&#39;t be in the same fight with a friend, you can help defend your friend&#39;s territory from attacks by leaving your fleet in orbit over their planet.<br><br>The universe is persistent, so anything gained is kept, allowing you to build up a large interstellar empire over time.<br><br>Gameplay -<br><br>* Play as an interstellar Corporation that warps to the safety of the Andromeda Galaxy to escape an alien invasion of Earth and The Milky Way.<br><br>* Build up an economy by constructing and upgrading habitats for workers, solar arrays for power, resorts for tourists, mines and refineries for metals, and much more.<br><br>* Hire a Stellar Representative that levels up and gains perk points that can be used to boost the efficiency all the planets in a solar system.<br><br>* Use the resources you&#39;ve harvested from your planets to build ships and outfit them with weapons and support modules.<br><br>* Create colony ships to expand your Corporation to even more planets and moons.<br><br>* Terraform your planets to make them more habitable for your Workers and Tourists by altering the planet&#39;s Temperature, Water Level and Pollution.<br><br>* Form fleets of up to 12 ships and retake Earth, Mars and the rest of Sol from the aliens known as &quot;Strith&quot;, or fight against other players and take their planets.<br><br>* Not into PvP? fleet battles and gains points that can unlock perks that boost all the ships in their fleet.<br><br>Land Battles -<br>Build defenses on the surface of your planets as a second layer of defense Many other stars are visible to the naked eye from Earth during the night, appearing as a multitude of¬†fixed¬†luminous points in the sky due to their immense distance from Earth. \r\n\r\nHistorically, the most prominent stars were grouped into¬†constellations¬†and¬†asterisms, the brightest of which gained proper names. The total mass of a star is the main factor that determines its¬†evolution¬†and eventual fate. \r\n\r\nOther characteristics of a star, including diameter and temperature, change over its life, while the star's environment affects its rotation and movement. \r\n\r\nA star's life¬†begins¬†with the¬†gravitational collapse¬†of a gaseous¬†nebula¬†of material composed primarily of hydrogen, along with helium and trace amounts of heavier elements. \r\n\r\nWhen the stellar core is sufficiently dense, hydrogen becomes steadily converted into helium through nuclear fusion, releasing energy in the process.¬†\r\n\r\nThe remainder of the star's interior carries energy away from the core through a combination of¬†radiative¬†and¬†convective¬†heat transfer¬†processes. The star's internal pressure prevents it from collapsing further under its own gravity. \r\n\r\nA star with mass greater than 0.4 times the Sun's will expand to become a¬†red giant¬†when the hydrogen¬†fuel¬†in its core is exhausted.¬†In some cases, it will fuse heavier¬†elements¬†at the core or in shells around the core. \r\n\r\nAs the star expands it throws a part of its mass, enriched with those heavier elements, into the interstellar environment, to be recycled later as new stars.¬†\r\n\r\nMeanwhile, the core becomes a¬†stellar remnant: a¬†white dwarf, a¬†neutron star, or, if it is sufficiently massive, a¬†black hole.\r\n\r\nBinary¬†and multi-star systems consist of two or more stars that are gravitationally bound and generally move around each other in stable¬†orbits.
